00001 /*===========================================================================
00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                        MtkResampleNearestNeighbor                         =
00004 =                                                                           =
00005 =============================================================================
00006 
00007                          Jet Propulsion Laboratory
00008                                    MISR
00009                                MISR Toolkit
00010 
00011             Copyright 2005, California Institute of Technology.
00012                            ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
00013                  U.S. Government Sponsorship acknowledged.
00014 
00015 ============================================================================*/
00016 
00017 #include "MisrReProject.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00020 #include <string.h>
00021 #include <math.h>
00022 
00038 MTKt_status MtkResampleNearestNeighbor(
00039   MTKt_DataBuffer srcbuf,     
00040   MTKt_DataBuffer linebuf,    
00041   MTKt_DataBuffer samplebuf,  
00042   MTKt_DataBuffer *resampbuf   )
00043 {
00044   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status */
00045   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return code of this function */
00046   MTKt_DataBuffer destbuf = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00047                                 /* Resampled data buffer structure */
00048   int lsrc;         /* Source line index */
00049   int ssrc;         /* Source sample index */
00050   int srcoff;               /* Data pointer offset into src buffer */
00051   int srcnum;           /* Number of elements in src buffer */
00052   int ldest;            /* Destination line index */
00053   int sdest;            /* Destination sample index */
00054   int destoff;              /* Data pointer offset into dest buffer */
00055   int destnum;              /* Number of elements in dest buffer */
00056 
00057   /* Check line and sample buffer sizes */
00058   if (linebuf.nline != samplebuf.nline)
00059     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(MTK_DIMENSION_MISMATCH);
00060   if (linebuf.nsample != samplebuf.nsample)
00061     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(MTK_DIMENSION_MISMATCH);
00062 
00063   /* Check line and sample buffer datatypes */
00064   if (linebuf.datatype != MTKe_float)
00065     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(MTK_DATATYPE_MISMATCH);
00066   if (samplebuf.datatype != MTKe_float)
00067     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(MTK_DATATYPE_MISMATCH);
00068 
00069   /* --------------------------------------------------- */
00070   /* Allocate buffers of the latitude and longitude data */
00071   /* --------------------------------------------------- */
00072 
00073   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(linebuf.nline, linebuf.nsample,
00074                  srcbuf.datatype, &destbuf);
00075   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00076 
00077   /* -------------------------------------------------- */
00078   /* Resample source data buffer using nearest neighbor */
00079   /* -------------------------------------------------- */
00080 
00081   srcnum = srcbuf.nline * srcbuf.nsample;
00082   destnum = destbuf.nline * destbuf.nsample;
00083 
00084   for (ldest=0; ldest < destbuf.nline; ldest++) {
00085     for (sdest=0; sdest < destbuf.nsample; sdest++) {
00086       lsrc = (int)floorf(linebuf.data.f[ldest][sdest] + 0.5);
00087       ssrc = (int)floorf(samplebuf.data.f[ldest][sdest] + 0.5);
00088       srcoff = lsrc * srcbuf.nsample + ssrc;
00089       destoff = ldest * destbuf.nsample + sdest;
00090       if (destoff >= 0 && destoff < destnum && srcoff >= 0 && srcoff < srcnum) {
00091     memcpy((void *)((char *)destbuf.dataptr + (destoff * destbuf.datasize)),
00092            (void *)((char *)srcbuf.dataptr + (srcoff * srcbuf.datasize)),
00093            destbuf.datasize);
00094       }
00095     }
00096   }
00097 
00098   *resampbuf = destbuf;
00099 
00100   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00101 ERROR_HANDLE:
00102   MtkDataBufferFree(&destbuf);
00103   return status_code;
00104 }
